content:
Hi! I am an incoming Master’s student in the Department of Economics at MIT, starting spring 2024. Currently, I am in the last year of my Bachelor of Economics at the University of São Paulo.
I am interested in development and health economics, particularly in their intersection with politics, trade, and environmental issues.
You can find my full CV here.
summary: Hi! I am an incoming Master’s student in the Department of Economics at MIT, starting spring 2024. Currently, I am in the last year of my Bachelor of Economics at the University of São Paulo.
title: Luca Moreno-Louzada
